text:
overall hotel ini nilai plusnya bersih, dari lobi sampai menuju kamar staffnya ramah2 sekali, sy pesan deluxe twin di last minute melalui aplikasi OTA, cek in minta di gabung karena kebetulan bawa anak kecil 2, permintaan di kabulkan oleh pihak hotel.

masuk kamar AC Super dingin, OK banget, Kamar bersih, luas. cek perlahan ke kamar mandi pun oke cukup bersih. 

yang kurang hanya air hangatnya, kurang berfungsi dng baik di kamar kami 324. nungguin hangat kok lama sekali sampai saya pikir mungkin water heaternya kurang berfungsi dengan baik. tp its oke lah saya tetap mandi.

area pool klo weekend di hari minggu ada acara untuk anak2, ada hewan2, cukup menyenangkan bagi anak2, apalagi ada pembagian snack.

sarapan pagi hari, cukup variatif. banyak menunya. mulai dari lontong sayur dengan menu2 pendampingnya, nasi goreng, mie goreng, sayur dll

ada spot menu sarapan anak2 juga, ada kentang, telur orak arik, nugget, spagetti dan beberapa lainnya sy kurang cek juga hehehe

ada nasi kuning, bubur ayam, buah2an, sereal dll

ada juga varian minuman mulai dari infuse water, juice dll, gak kalah ketinggalan varian roti2an..

yaa cukup komplit lah. hanya saja beberapa menu rasanya kurang (hambar) mungkin ini lebih ditingkatkan lagi mengenai citra rasanya.

bagusnya hotel ini yg menjadi nilai plus2nya adalah karena adanya sajadah dan alat solat lengkap. sy cukup tertolong dengan adanya alat solat dikamar.

mungkin kalau staycation di bogor, saya akan kembali ke hotel ini lagi. 

saran membangun, beberapa spot hotel tlng lampunya lebih dilebih terangkan saja agar tidak cenderung temaram.

wangi kopi diarea lift dan lobi bikin segerrr, sy suka..

text:
Saya suka hotel ini karena punya masjid yang nyaman. Kurun waktu setahun terakhir ini, kami menginap tiga kali di sini. Dua kali sebelumnya, biasa saja. Namun kali ketiga ini, kami diberi kamar yang masih kotor, bau dan tidak rapi. Sepertinya, petugas kamar tidak menjalankan tugasnya dengan baik. Setelah komplain, baru lah kami dipindahkan ke kamar yang sudah bersih dan rapi.

Sayang sekali hotel megah dan asri seperti ini gagal menerapkan sistem Quality Control. Bagaimana mungkin kamar yang masih kotor, bau dan tak rapi bisa diberikan ke tamu??

Kalau sarapan pagi yang seadanya saja, masih bisa dimaklumi. Biasa terjadi di berbagai hotel yang sedang sepi tamu. Tapi kalau kamar kotor, bau dan tak rapi diberikan ke tamu? Itu adalah kesalahan fatal.

Bila manajemen hotel tidak berbenah memperbaiki diri, pasti banyak orang yang akan kapok nginap di sini. Terimakasih. Semoga bermanfaat.
title: Kamar Masih Kotor, Bau dan Tak Rapi Kok Diberikan Ke Tamu?

text:
Hotel Sahira yang beralamat di Jl. A. Yani 17-23 Bogor merupakan hotel bintang-4 dengan jumlah kamar 122 terdiri atas kamar delux (82), family delux (34-triple), junior suite room (4) dan Sahira Suite (2). Ukuran kamar cukup besar jadi cukup nyaman apa bila sharing dengan teman atau keluarga, dimana utk kelg tersedia kamar triple yang cukup luas. Tiap kamar tersedia air mineral + gula, tek & kopi dan pemanas air. Juga ada perlengkapan lain sandal, sabun, sampo, sikat gigi, hair drier, perlengkapan sholat, namun sayang tidak ada tisue, sisir dan alat cukur.  Menginap di akhir tahun cukup ramai karena banyak instansi pemerintah/swasta melakukan kegiatan meeting dan temu bisnis. Hotel ini menyediakan fasilitas meeting dan 1 ball room,  kap rang: 225 orang (class room), 120 org (usahpe) dan 450 (theatre). Juga tersedia kolam renang, children playground, kids corner, fitness center dan mushola.
Hotel ini favorit untuk rapat2, sehingga saat makan siang ramai sekali di restoran, sehingga seolah-olah jumlah tamu lebih banyak dari pada jumlah sendok makan.
Sarapan tersedia macam-macam seperti nasi putih, nasigoreng, nasi kuning, bubur ayam, bubur sumsum, soto ayam, sop ayam, roti dan macam-macam kue termasuk kue cubit, serta buah-buahan (semangka, melon, pepaya, apel) maupun salad. Untuk penggemar jamu juga tersedia jamu gendong: beras kencur, kunyit, jahe, sambiloto, temu lawak dll. Biaya menginap mulai sekitar Rp. 1 juta-an, untuk corporate bisa memperoleh harga khusus. Lokasinya dekat air mancur dan tempat perbelanjaan seperi matahari mall, Bogor permai, serta banyak kuliner yang favorit. Silahkan mencoba
title: Pengalaman menginap di hotel Sahira

text: Hotel baru dengan kondisi yang masih bagus. Pelayanan pada saat check in dan check out jg memuaskan. Bath amenities yg disediakan kurang, hanya disediakan satu sikat gigi di kamar mandi, sedangkan satu kamar diisi dua orang. Dan tidak tersedia pasta gigi. Sarapannya bervariasi, dengan rasa yang menurut saya enak. Saya mengambil nasi goreng dan ternyata rasanya sangat pedas padahal banyak anak kecil waktu itu yang juga mengambil nasi goreng. Pelayanan saat sarapan tidak memuaskan, saya harus menunggu 30 menit untuk sebuah omelette, lalu toaster roti yg tidak panas, setelah ditanyakan pada waiter dia mengaku tidak mengerti. Yang paling menggelikan adalah hotel ini mengklaim sebagai hotel bertema madani/islami tapi tidak ada lantai 4 di hotelnya padahal dalam islam tidak dibenarkan mempercayai hal seperti itu.

text:
I stayed for 3 nights, actually everything is just standard, the strict rules that check in must at 2 PM, eventhough receptionist promise to inform you if the room is ready but nothing notification until you come by yourself to the receptionist desk at 2 PM to ask your room availability. Laundry won’t be delivered at the same day, or maybe not delivered too on the next day, if you don’t call them regarding your laundries. The food and everything are standard. Maybe I’m  generous enough to give this hotel rate 4.

Until I was shocked when they moved breakfast location to the corridor of 2nd floor. With very dirty table, lack of table, and lack of food. Even lack of waiters, a waitress didn’t finish cleaning table when I need to use it, the last table they had for me. I asked for cereals and they said they don’t serve cereal that day, the days before they had cereals. The cause of this very poor restaurant service is they were having a wedding party at the real restaurant location, so they moved breakfast activity at corridor 2nd floor.

I feel sorry to guests who expect their holiday will be a perfect staycation at Safira Hotel, but it won’t happen because the Safira hotel want to provide wedding parties but they don’t have a hall so they have to use restaurant area and give the room hotel guests a hotel corridor with lack of food, lack of tables and lack of waiters. So poor services..
title: Not so nice hotel

text:
First impression of this hotel was that this is a beautiful hotel, decorated in classic theme. This hotel is moslem friendly, they provide sajadah (praying mat), and mukena (praying robe) in every room, they also have mosque in their backyard. Another plus side from this hotel is they have enough parking space. The room was clean and spacy, with comfortable beds. Their family room is affordable. This hotel also located near many restaurants and cafes.

However, some improvements are still needed. Swimming pool need to be cleaned more often. More attention is also needed at breakfast time. At 8-9 am, only small amount of foods left. They need to provide more foods and beverages since there were still a lot of guests who had breakfast at 9, especially at weekends.
title: Nice hotel for families

It is provided by good air conditioner, 2 screens and standby staffs. Lobby and restaurant are look lux. Also for the food, the taste was good and really various. 

It is located strategically near the center of the city and toll gate. Your vehicle is easy to get here in a one-way street. Beside that, you can enjoy your culinary trip around hotel. There are many restaurants and cafes with their own unique near the hotel. You can choose them only by-feet.

text:
Really excited at first about this hotel since my husband often stay here for business trip, and he really recommend this hotel. I've booked the deluxe single type H-2 before I stay, they confirmed that I get the room. On the day in the morning (before I arrived at the hotel), they still confirmed that I get the room, and I told them I will arrive after Isya' time. 

Finally we arrived at the hotel around 8.30pm. All the check in process was good. But when we open the room I was really really really shocked! The room haven't been cleaned yet!! There were some cigarettes in ash tray, plastics, pillow and sandals not in the good position, etc. The room just like still in use by another visitor.

I was complaining about this to the receptionist, they said very sorry because there's something wrong with the system then they don't know that the room still unclean after the last visitor. 

Because my 1-year daughter has fall asleep, I don't have any choice to find another hotel except upgrading new room with twice price and no compensation at all. I really disappointed about this. And one of their Supervisor didn't have a good will to explain what this is all about even though he's there in the front desk, yes only the frontliner that said very sorry to us (and I really appreciate it).

But above all, just like my husband said, the room are good, the breakfast is really good (taste good & many variance), playground for children are good (indoor & outdoor), syariah system is really really good.
I still recommend this hotel but you have to make sure about the booking room process.
title: Disappointed About Room-Booked

text:
17-Dec-17.
Initially we are looking for a hotel for holidays with children and we found this sharia hotel on tripadvisor. The review is quite good so we decided to try it.
Arrived at the hotel, we were quite surprised because the hotel parking is quite big. But unfortunately when we unload our bags, none of the hotel staff is helpful. The check in process is not too long. We stay in a deluxe twin room with the size of the room is not big and not small. For us, the bathroom and twin beds are too small. The view from the rooms is pretty good, although the location of the hotel is on the side of the road but the visible view is the trees and rice fields as well as the mountains which is quite beautiful. Hotel facilities available at the hotel include kids playground (outdoor next to restaurant), kids club ( more likely) its location next to mushola for women only, swimming pool on the 3rd floor and restaurant on the ground floor. Overall, this hotel is not a budget hotel and not a luxury hotel (chek out the room rate for yourself), some types of rooms are rather over price in our opinion. Shalat in the room quite difficult (suggesting prayers at the mosque on the 2nd floor or ground floor), the room floor is very cold (maybe if added a little carpet, would be nice) the breakfast taste good although the choice is not much. around the hotel are many eating places that can be reached on foot. This hotel quite recommended for families with children.
title: Not too BIG and not to small

text: I've been there a couple times for meetings. The hotel's room design is pretty simple, yet people can feel an air of luxury, thanks to the chandeliers and and marble stairs. Since this is a sharia hotel, the hotel has its own mosque, a small praying room close to the meeting room, and a praying mat+female praying outfit in every room. It's only 5-10 minutes away from Bogor train station, but it's not located in a busy road, so it's pretty peaceful. Their food is amazing, too. However, I have to say that a one of the room's windows leaked when it rained hard.

text:
Dear Sahira board of management,

I was really interesting to booked in The Sahira hotel last month. Most people said in their review that Sahira has quite a good dish, so I proposed this hotel to my company for bussiness luncheon since we have an event that will be held in Bogor.

Unfortunately, my good enthusiasm paid really bad. 
My company, which is a multinational company, feel so rejected by the customer service's staff when we gathering the information by phone. 

Ms. Anis or Anisa maybe, if I am not wrong, who pick up the phone, wasnt greet us warmly, but in other way explain everything unwillingly without showing any respect.
Its a normal things for people to gather information before they booked, isnt it?
 I have asked her also to call us back, bit we didnt get any call for a month, yes, for a whole month.

I hope that you are not only mantain your pride with just serving a good place place to stay, but also good manner and respect for customer and potential customer. I was highly dissappointed by your service. And I am quite sure that it will be your big lost for you if you keep your standard this way.

I hope that Sahira could be better.

Regards,
title: Interesting place to stay, but horrible in customer services

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr / Mrs. Aishah F

Warmest greetings from The Sahira Hotel,

Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at The Sahira Hotel. We apologize that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies.
At The Sahira Hotel, we strive to provide a superior service experience for every customer; therefore your feedback is very important to us. For our Sales and Marketing staff will re-enforce the training to reassurance to all guest our services standards. 
We appreciate your sharing your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the near future.

Warm regards
The Management
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: J'ai passé deux semaines dans cet établissement et j'ai beaucoup apprécié la gentillesse du personnel et la qualité de l'écoute et du service. Les chambres sont très confortables, la cuisine de qualité et la piscine agréable après une journée de travail. Excellent rapport qualité prix.
title: Établissement de qualité à un prix raisonnable

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr/Mrs. Jean Charles d

Warmest greetings from The Sahira Hotel,

First of all, thank you for choosing The Sahira Hotel Bogor, we highly appreciate that you have taken the time to share your experience with us. 
We are very please you have a great stay with us, enjoying all the hotel facilities especially the atmosphere and feel of madani concept
Once again thank you for your valuable review, and we are looking forward for you to come to The Sahira Hotel any time when you come to Bogor.

Warm regards
The Management
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik
